"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":51778,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4865e62c-3765-468b-aca7-5a986a7580fb/hr-nt-2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4865e62c-3765-468b-aca7-5a986a7580fb/hr-nt-2.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hr-nt-2.PNG\",\"name\":\"hr-nt-2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4865e62c-3765-468b-aca7-5a986a7580fb\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":147.6233215547703},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3462,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f2f93ebf-01f9-4f8e-86c3-7d034a3fe4f5/lpkoo.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f2f93ebf-01f9-4f8e-86c3-7d034a3fe4f5/lpkoo.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"lpkoo.PNG\",\"name\":\"lpkoo.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f2f93ebf-01f9-4f8e-86c3-7d034a3fe4f5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":227,\"height\":35},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Process audit,  evaluation of internal candidates, preparation of candidates for interviews, participation in interviews for key positions, assistance in creating a list of interview questions, creating profiles of candidates' positions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4534,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/101842a7-699a-4f38-80fe-914d77df0287/kokoko.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/101842a7-699a-4f38-80fe-914d77df0287/kokoko.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"kokoko.PNG\",\"name\":\"kokoko.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"101842a7-699a-4f38-80fe-914d77df0287\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":273,\"height\":36},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creating and providing support of the adaptation process on request, consulting on adaptation TL/PM, developing an adaptation action plan, adaptation content creation (beginner packages, surveys), adaptation portals creation and development, conducting pulse surveys on adaptation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7424,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51e3b9e5-3ef0-41cc-81f2-62f3e89fd8ec/jjiji.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51e3b9e5-3ef0-41cc-81f2-62f3e89fd8ec/jjiji.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"jjiji.PNG\",\"name\":\"jjiji.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"51e3b9e5-3ef0-41cc-81f2-62f3e89fd8ec\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":525,\"height\":37},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creating and nourishing feedback culture on the project/account, developing employees’ «areas of improvement» based on the results of the surveys, developing and implementing action plans to improve the performance of the team.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4452,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3faeffb1-ddc4-45cd-ba6a-fd0e1a027be3/oooo.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3faeffb1-ddc4-45cd-ba6a-fd0e1a027be3/oooo.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"oooo.PNG\",\"name\":\"oooo.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3faeffb1-ddc4-45cd-ba6a-fd0e1a027be3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":270,\"height\":37},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Organization of the succession process in the team – creation of tools, assistance in identifying HIPO and successors within the project, consulting managers on opportunities for HIPO and successors, building a training program for HIPO development and seminars with PMs, establishing regular monitoring processes of HIPO employees, creating appropriate courses and training materials on succession planning, providing recommendations to organizational stakeholders in the areas of leadership development, performance management and succession planning.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5288,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ea4d81b8-70d9-4706-8cf3-8be8487d6e6b/huhuhuhPNG.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ea4d81b8-70d9-4706-8cf3-8be8487d6e6b/huhuhuhPNG.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"huhuhuhPNG.PNG\",\"name\":\"huhuhuhPNG.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ea4d81b8-70d9-4706-8cf3-8be8487d6e6b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":364,\"height\":38},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Audit of the existing recognition and motivation system, creation of a recognition process and strategy, development and implementation of new programs, development of the Hero Badges project (badge of the customer, from colleagues, managers), organization of recognition events, development of quarterly digests, development of birthday greetings notifications, spreading employees’ success stories by email and other channels, creation of recognition trainings and seminars for managers.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5768,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d7303e91-b80b-49b6-ad20-89ae50eb57e8/knjhvfc.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d7303e91-b80b-49b6-ad20-89ae50eb57e8/knjhvfc.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"knjhvfc.PNG\",\"name\":\"knjhvfc.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d7303e91-b80b-49b6-ad20-89ae50eb57e8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":378,\"height\":35},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Organization of events for the team, including gamification, assistance in regular work with the Community platform.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2869,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bcb645e-2585-4a2c-9b65-68c5b3b6672d/kmjbgfx.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bcb645e-2585-4a2c-9b65-68c5b3b6672d/kmjbgfx.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"kmjbgfx.PNG\",\"name\":\"kmjbgfx.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6bcb645e-2585-4a2c-9b65-68c5b3b6672d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":206,\"height\":41},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Organizing and conducting surveys, interpretation of survey results, development and implementation of action plans.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3255,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1ed12002-67c0-44a3-a3bd-c6ce528992b9/ojuygtfdsz.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1ed12002-67c0-44a3-a3bd-c6ce528992b9/ojuygtfdsz.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"ojuygtfdsz.PNG\",\"name\":\"ojuygtfdsz.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1ed12002-67c0-44a3-a3bd-c6ce528992b9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":215,\"height\":36},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creation and support of communications within projects (digests, events), media plans development and promotion.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5299,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ffa9a64a-a52f-4ddc-9e6f-e6c152f481c7/oojhygfdxdfg.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ffa9a64a-a52f-4ddc-9e6f-e6c152f481c7/oojhygfdxdfg.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"oojhygfdxdfg.PNG\",\"name\":\"oojhygfdxdfg.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ffa9a64a-a52f-4ddc-9e6f-e6c152f481c7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":387,\"height\":39},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creating an information channel to communicate information within the project in Teams, developing long-term communication plans for the project, consultation and support of special events contributing to achieving project goals (town halls, meetings, conferences, seminars, trainings) assistance in solving communication problems between the Customer's teams and EPAM.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5449,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/99729266-d50c-4c2e-a0b3-ea08e96f013b/jhgfdfghjkl.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/99729266-d50c-4c2e-a0b3-ea08e96f013b/jhgfdfghjkl.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"jhgfdfghjkl.PNG\",\"name\":\"jhgfdfghjkl.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"99729266-d50c-4c2e-a0b3-ea08e96f013b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":363,\"height\":32},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Analysis of the reasons for dismissal, search for retention methods, creation of employee motivation maps, holding 1-1 meetings, conducting motivational events, conducting and analyzing satisfaction surveys.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5342,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8c4f86a4-c6af-411f-b4f5-c6d3c55b5543/liutrdxcv.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8c4f86a4-c6af-411f-b4f5-c6d3c55b5543/liutrdxcv.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"liutrdxcv.PNG\",\"name\":\"liutrdxcv.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8c4f86a4-c6af-411f-b4f5-c6d3c55b5543\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":341,\"height\":36},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Selection and creation of training programs, development and implementation of mentoring programs.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
